title: 115_hr66
content: Route 66 Centennial Commission Act This bill establishes the Route 66 Centennial Commission to honor highway Route 66 on the occasion of its centennial anniversary. The bill sets forth the duties of the commission, its membership, powers, and reporting requirements. The Department of Transportation shall prepare a plan on the preservation needs of Route 66. The commission shall terminate not later than June 30, 2027.
